column5: Language warning, although I think he would be forgiven.
There is a vid on utube of a kiwi guy on a kayak being followed/chased by a white pointer. Paddling full speed and the shark is right on his tail. Pretty scary.
A good stock of brown swimtrunks is a must if you fish from a kayak IMO.
haha. Love his reaction after. Very cool
Don't think I'd be dangling my hands or feet in the water.
hahaha, you can just feel his adrenaline rush
